# DmiProperty.Processor.Characteristics.Capable128Bits property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

128-bit Capable indicates the maximum data width capability of the processor.

Key Composition

* Structure: Processor
* Property: Capable64Bits
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

Remarks

2.5+

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey Capable128Bits { get; }
```
